# Lux Finance

> Decentralized finance (DeFi) hub for the Lux Network ecosystem.

## About

Lux Finance provides decentralized financial services built on Lux Network's post-quantum blockchain. Access lending, borrowing, yield farming, and liquidity protocols secured by quantum-resistant cryptography.

## Key Features

- Lending and borrowing protocols
- Yield farming and liquidity mining
- Post-quantum security for all DeFi operations
- Sub-second transaction finality
- Cross-chain DeFi via Lux Bridge Chain

## Links

- [Lux Network](https://lux.network)
- [Documentation](https://docs.lux.network/defi)
- [GitHub](https://github.com/luxfi)
